lead_paragraph: Brazilian tennis great Gustavo Kuerten has been selected to light the Olympic Cauldron at the Rio 2016 Olympic Games after soccer great Pele declined to take part because of health problems, the UOL Internet news service reported on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Brazil Tennis Star Kuerten to Light Rio Cauldron, UOL Says
headline.main: Brazil Tennis Star Kuerten to Light Rio Cauldron, UOL Says

snippet: Brazilian tennis great Gustavo Kuerten has been selected to light the Olympic Cauldron at the Rio 2016 Olympic Games after soccer great Pele declined to take part because of health problems, the UOL Internet news service reported on Friday....
